org.tinylog.writers

Interface Writer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFormatPatternWriter, ConsoleWriter, FileWriter, LogcatWriter

    public interface Writer
    Writers output issued log entries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the writer.
      void flush()
      Outputs buffered log entries immediately.
      Collection<LogEntryValue> getRequiredLogEntryValues()
      Returns all log entry values that are required for outputting a log entry.
      void write(LogEntry logEntry)
      Outputs a given log entry.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequiredLogEntryValues

        Collection<LogEntryValue> getRequiredLogEntryValues()
        Returns all log entry values that are required for outputting a log entry.
        Returns:
        All returned values will be filled in passed LogEntry objects

      • write

        void write(LogEntry logEntry)
    throws Exception
        Outputs a given log entry.
        Parameters:
        logEntry - Log entry to output
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception can be thrown if writing has been failed

      • flush

        void flush()
    throws Exception
        Outputs buffered log entries immediately.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception can be thrown if flushing has been failed

      • close

        void close()
    throws Exception
        Closes the writer. All allocated resources should be released in this method.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception can be thrown if closing has been failed
